hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Deku Scrub Lobby Rear

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)
